title: Bug 122584 - Cascading Parameter Values Not Displayed Properly in HTML Viewer
description: The issue at hand is that cascading parameter values are not displayed correctly in the HTML viewer. When the first parameter value is selected, it is expected that the second parameter value in the same cascading parameter group should be displayed, but it is not appearing as expected.
OB: The observed behavior indicates that when the first parameter value is chosen, the second parameter value in the cascading parameter group is not displayed as it should be.
EB: The expected behavior is that when a user selects the first parameter value, the second parameter value within the same cascading parameter group should be displayed correctly in the HTML viewer.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:
1. Open the attached design file in the HTML viewer.
2. Click on the 'Change Parameter' button in the HTML viewer.
